name: rats
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an expression of anger or disappointment: Oh, rats! I forgot my keys. Aw, rats! I thought we were done.
More examplesFewer examplesRats, I've made a mistake.Rats! Yes, I'm disappointed.Oh, rats! Okay. Let's solve this problem.I never get an interview. Rats!You know that feeling when the phone rings and you think "oh rats I'm gonna miss the show."Rats! I have to be at work in a couple of hours.
